ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can vegetable juice (such as V8Â®)
1/2 teaspoon dried minced onion, or to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A lovely (and UBER hearty) tomato-based soup with lean tenderloin steak and fresh kale leaves. Great option for a lunch or dinner!"
ins: Mix vegetable juice, sirloin steak, kale, dried onion, garlic powder, salt and black pepper in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let stand until the kale is softened, about 5 minutes. Serve and enjoy!
